text: Yellow Faced Tiger (, originally released in the United States as Slaughter in San Francisco) is a 1974 Hong Kong American action thriller movie directed by Lo Wei and starring Chuck Norris, Sylvia Chang, Don Wong Tao, Dan Ivan. ==Other websites== * Category:1974 action movies Category:1974 thriller movies Category:Hong Kong action movies Category:Hong Kong thriller movies Category:American action thriller movies Category:Movies set in San Francisco Category:Martial arts movies Category:Movies directed by Lo Wei
title: Yellow Faced Tiger
